Package common

Class Usermanager

java.lang.Object
common.Usermanager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Usermanager extends Object implements Serializable
The Usermanager class manages the current user sessions in the system. It keeps track of the currently logged-in general park worker and traveler.
See Also:
